Entries.Mon: 你今天怎么样？@。我希望镇上一切顺利。
Entries.Thu: 你好，@！#$b#很高兴你为我的项目提供了帮助。$1
Entries.Fri: %馆长正在看报纸。#$b#啊~ 美好的一天，年轻人！@。#$b#你赶上了最新的消息，你听说过在蔚蓝海岸附近有美人鱼的踪影吗？$3

Entries.6372001/t 1000 2100: 50s/20 49/Curator 16 46 3 farmer -100 -100 0 Goldie 15 46 0/skippable/pause 500/speak Curator "就这里了，戈迪。你为新家感到兴奋吗？$0"/pause 500/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Goldie "...$0#$b#...$1"/pause 500/emote Goldie 32/pause 500/playSound stoneStep/pause 500/jump Curator 3/emote Curator 28/pause 1500/textAboveHead Curator "我们的第一位客人！"/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 16 52/faceDirection Curator 2/speak Curator "欢迎来到星露水族馆！$4"/pause 1500/move Curator 3 0 2/move Curator 0 3 2/move farmer 0 -1 0/speak Curator "你一定是威利告诉我的那个农夫！很高兴认识你！$0"/pause 500/speak Curator "是的，你的名声很高，年轻人！$0"/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Curator "你愿意帮我个忙么？$3"/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 1 true/move Curator -2 0 2 true/speak Curator "你可能已经注意到了，我们目前鱼有点短缺。$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Curator 0/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Curator "除非你把可爱的戈迪也算进去，哈？$1"/pause 500/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Goldie "...$1#$b#...$2/pause 500/faceDirection Curator 2 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/speak Curator "我听说你钓鱼很在行。$0"/pause 500/emote Curator 28/speak Curator "也许你会考虑捐出一些你的捕获物给我们展示？$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Curator "你可以把它们放在这里，在柜台上。它们要花一天的时间才能适应新的栖息地。$0#$b#别担心，我们拥有最先进的技术能确保它们的健康。#$b#就像戈迪一样。$1"/playSound dropItemInWater/speak Goldie "...$2#$b#...$3"/pause 500/emote Goldie 20/pause 500/emote farmer 56/speak Curator "那真是太棒了，谢谢你！$4#$b#我们会把它们都记录下来。$0"/pause 1500/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/move farmer 0 1 2/textAboveHead Curator "还有一件事"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Curator "你可能在途中注意到了潜水艇，那是我们的礼品店！$0#$b#我们目前库存不多，但是随着展览的增加，我们的商品也将增加！$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end

Entries.6372003/t 1000 2100/i {{spacechase0.Json: 50s/20 49/Curator 15 47 2 farmer -100 -100 0 Goldie 15 46 0/skippable/pause 500/playSound stoneStep/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 16 52/speak Curator "Ah hello @!$0"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 500/move Curator 1 0 2/speak Curator "So what have you come to donate today @?$1"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 15/pause 200/playSound fishSlap/addObject 16 47 {{spacechase0.JsonAssets/ObjectId:Razor Trout}} 1/pause 100/showFrame farmer 12/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 3/move farmer -1 0 0/pause 200/jump Curator 4/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 200/emote Curator 16/pause 500/move Curator -1 0 2 true/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Curator "Oh no @, that won't do!$6"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Curator "I know this fish, it's the Razor Trout.$2#$b#It's an invasive species to this area...$5"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Curator "It also eats other fish!$0"/pause 200/jump farmer 5/pause 200/speak Goldie "...$0#$b#*Goldie looks scared*$7"/pause 500/emote Goldie 16/pause 500/speak Curator "I don't think the Aquarium is a place for such a fish...$2#$b#You better take it with you.$0"/move farmer 1 0 0/pause 500/showFrame farmer 15/pause 200/removeSprite 16 47/playSound pickUpItem/pause 200/showFrame farmer 12/pause 500/speak Curator "Don't feel bad, I'm sure you didn't mean any harm.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/end
